channel.title: Hey im new, lil help on ips please
channel.description: how can i get onto a friends ip server? im stil on the basics only jus downloaded got stats like all 99. what do i do from here? please and thankyou.

item.title: Hey im new, lil help on ips please
item.dc:creator: @bigmac bigmac
item.description:
@bigmac wrote:

yup what frank said basically go to file>new server> enter you friends server i.p and click ok then go to the login bit and hit enter. then put any old username and password preferbly not your runescape one. And then login and play away =)

Read full topic
item.source: Hey im new, lil help on ips please

item.title: Hey im new, lil help on ips please
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Well, once you enter his IP and log on you should be on his server.

item.title: Hey im new, lil help on ips please

Tell him to check his ip and then File>>New Server>> Enter his IP
